        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • checkNotNullOrBlank

        public static String checkNotNullOrBlank(String value,
                         String errorMessage,
                         Object... args)
        Ensures that a String is not null and contains at least one non-whitespace char.
        Parameters:
        value - an String
        Returns:
        the String, trimmed of any leading/trailing whitespace
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if value is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if value is empty
